channel.title: BabaGyan.com
channel.description: The BabaGyan.com has News and Podcast on Technology, Analytics and Data Science. It is a place to listen to podcast about latest in technology, learn new technologies, share your knowledge. You will learn about range of things from guests who have done it and know it. Podcast will also feature weekly News analysis for technology, finance and world macro economics topics.

item.content:encoded:
COMING SOON

A new podcast on Technology, Analytics and Data Science as core with some off-road trips to finance new, world news and related topics.

If you want to be our guest on podcast or want to be a co-host or host on your own on the BabaGyan podcast, please write to use an email at Contact@BabaGyan.com!
